notes: bshape (base shape) describes the overall shape of the fractal
must be composed of horizontal and vertical segments
rshape (recursive shape) describes the fine details of the fractal
must be composed of horizontal and vertical segments
depth is the complexity of the fractal
if depth is zero, the resulting fractal is the base shape
If flip is true, the recursive shape will be flipped
along the x-axis after each depth iteration
this has no effect if depth is less than two
output defines properties of the resulting fractal image
the filename should always end wiht .png
width and height are in pixels
